Shopify Accordion Feature Grid Section

Learn how to create an Accordion Feature Grid section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The Accordion Feature Grid is a dynamic and responsive Shopify section that allows you to showcase the features of your products in a stylish and interactive accordion layout. The features are displayed in a grid format, with a headline, descriptive text, and a clickable "Call to Action" button that can be linked to any URL. Each feature includes an image that can zoom in upon hovering for better details. This customizable section is perfect for providing a visually appealing and organized display of your products' features.

Demo of the Section

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  • Presenting product features: Use the accordion feature grid to showcase your productâ€™s diverse features in detail with high-definition images.

  • Highlighting services: If your e-commerce store offers services, each service can be emphasized in individual sections of the accordion together with detailed descriptions.

  • Showcasing collections: You can also utilize the feature grid to highlight different collections available in your store. Use high-quality images that capture the essence of each collection and link to the respective collection pages.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

The Accordion Feature Grid offers configuration settings for complete customization, including:

Fonts: Decide whether to override the theme fonts and customize the text and headline fonts.

Text Settings: Adjust text size, color, and line height for both the body and headline text.

Color Settings: Choose the background color and define the opacity.

Button Style: Configurable background color, text color, padding, and border radius of the call-to-action (CTA) button.

Dimensions: Adjust the maximum width of the section, height, the gap between images, padding, border radius, as well as all these properties specifically for mobile view.

Advanced Settings: Activate or deactivate the zoom on hover feature.

In addition, each feature in the grid has its individual settings such as image selection, headline text, call-to-action text, and URL assignment. You can choose to link the entire feature block if desired.

Integrating this section into your Shopify store gives it a professional, user-friendly look and enhances the shopping experience for your customers.
